reach.description: Extends attack reach to interact with distant entities.

noattack.description: Prevents attacking protected entities like villagers or pets.

impactattack.description: Performs rapid consecutive attacks on entities.

lockon.description: Locks onto a target and maintains aim.

supersprint.description: Boosts sprint speed beyond normal limits.

safewalk.description: Prevents falling off block edges while walking.

freeze.description: Stops all player movement and prevents data from being sent to the server while active.

automine.description: Automatically mines blocks in front of the player using the best available tool.

fastbreak.description: Increases block breaking speed beyond normal game limits.

featherwalk.description: Reduces fall damage and lets the player step smoothly over blocks.

waterhover.description: Lets the player hover or walk across the surface of water.

freecamera.description: Lets the camera move freely without moving the player's actual body.

antioverlay.description: Removes unnecessary visual overlays such as fog, pumpkin blur, or darkness.

supersight.description: Enhances visibility by improving lighting and contrast in the environment.

xray.description: Allows you to see through blocks to locate ores, caves, and hidden structures.

cameraconfig.description: Configures camera distance, clipping, and anti-hurt tilt.

freecamera.description: Detaches the camera from the player, allowing free movement.

radar.description: Displays nearby entities and players on a radar overlay.

xray.description: Highlights ores and hidden structures through blocks.

fullbright.description: Maximizes game brightness for better visibility.

radar.description: Displays nearby entities on a radar overlay.

antioverlay.description: Removes visual overlays such as fog or pumpkin blur.

autototem.description: Automatically equips a totem when health is low.

freecamera.description: Lets you move the camera freely without moving your player.

serverinfo.description: Displays current server information and stats.

aimode.description: Lets Minecraft AI handle all player actions automatically.

woodcutter.description: Automatically collects and cuts wood from trees.

serverinfo.description: Displays information about the current server such as ping, IP, and player count.
